pages.text: $(li)The Marsh is a biome composed mostly of Water, $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/clay_ball)Clay$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/environmental/mud_ball)Mud$(/l).$(br)$(li)In this wet place you can find some water vegetation, like Lilypads, Seagrass, Duckweed, and Tall Cattail.$(br)$(li)Some aquatic animals like Perchs, $(l:patchouli:creatures/upgrade_aquatic/pike)Pikes$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/environmental/slabfish)Slabfish$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/squid)Squids$(/l) can be found here too.
$(li)You can search this biome by typing the word $(l)Marsh$() in the search box of the $(l:patchouli:perks/natures_compass)Nature's Compass$(/l).
